objects.text:
18L Storage Capacity
Dual Exterior Zippers
Mesh Side Pockets for Bottles
Perfect for 15.6-inch Laptops

product_details.name: ASUS URBN AP1601 Laptop Bag, 18L Storage Capcity, Dual Exteriro Zippers, Dual Mesh Side Pockets for bottles, With Luggage Strap for Travelling,Suitable for 15.6-inch (39.62cm) Laptop (Grey)
product_details.description: Brand: ASUS. Series: AP1601 ASUS BACKPACK. Colour: Charcoal Grey. Item Height: 45 Centimeters. Item Width: 12 Centimeters. Product Dimensions: 32 x 12 x 45 cm; 400 g. Country of Origin: India. Item Weight: 400 g. Importer: ASUS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, 402, Supreme chambers, 17/18, Shah Industrial Estate, Veera Desai Road, Andheri (West), Mumbai 400053, India. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 32 x 12 x 45 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Laptop Bag.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern product advertisement with a clean, professional layout. The background features soft gradient wave patterns and outlined rectangles in deep blues, lending a sleek, digital aesthetic. A bold heading (`heading`) appears at the top-left in large dark typography, followed by a vibrant subheading (`subheading`) in blue that introduces the product. Key features are listed below in a concise paragraph (`description`). A red one-line promotional message (`tagline`) grabs urgency, placed right above the price section. The price (`price`) is presented prominently in dark font. A call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) labeled in white over a blue button reinforces conversion. The product image (`product_image`) is positioned on the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy: `#2c3e50`
- Sky Blue: `#3498db`
- Slate Gray: `#34495e`
- Light Gray/White: `#f5f5f5`
- Alert Red: `#e74c3c`
product_color: The product image features a sleek backpack with a minimalist, professional look, using a neutral and modern color palette. The dominant color is a textured medium gray fabric (#7A7E7F), giving the bag a refined and urban appeal. Accents such as the zippers, seams, logo, and bottom portion are in a deep black or charcoal (#1A1A1A), adding contrast and highlighting structural elements. These colors blend in a balanced way, while the black components help emphasize the backpack’s design lines and functionality. For a banner, complementary tones like white (#FFFFFF) or soft silver (#B0B0B0) can add clarity and sophistication without competing.
